name: Adobe Acrobat Reader缓冲区溢出漏洞（CNVD-2025-16321）
product: ["Adobe Acrobat DC <=25.001.20428", "Adobe Acrobat Reader DC <=25.001.20428", "Adobe Acrobat 2024 <=24.001.30225", "Adobe Acrobat 2020 <=20.005.30748", "Adobe Acrobat Reader 2020 <=20.005.30748"]
description: Adobe Acrobat Reader是美国奥多比（Adobe）公司的一款PDF查看器。该软件用于打印，签名和注释 PDF。Adobe Acrobat Reader存在缓冲区错误漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致任意代码执行。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/acrobat/apsb25-14.html
patch: Adobe Acrobat Reader缓冲区溢出漏洞（CNVD-2025-16321）的补丁
